attributes.action: Protect arts funding in schools/society from devastating cuts. Invest in future
attributes.background:
Schools are being forced to drop arts and councils slash arts funding due to extreme cuts, meanwhile MPs agree to even more self pay increases.
The uk produces some of the finest arts in the world, we should maintain this. Even Winston Churchill refused to cut arts funding in wartime! Invest in art

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understanding that you're concerned about arts funding, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
